meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size
meanings.sent1: The teentsier puppy fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The teentsier flower bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The teentsier button on the remote was hard to press.
meanings.sent4: Her teentsier voice was barely audible over the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The teentsier pebble sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The teentsier cup was perfect for the little girl's hands.
meanings.sent2: The teentsier box was hidden behind the larger one.
meanings.sent3: The teentsier cookie looked lonely next to the giant cake.
meanings.sent4: His teentsier car struggled to keep up with the faster vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The teentsier star twinkled beside the bright moon.
